item.description:
Year End Holiday Social February 12th Bowl-A-Rama

2143 Berlin Turnpike Newington 6 p.m.

It's the Jaycee year end celebration! 

Event includes 2 games of bowling, shoe rental and buffet including

baked chicken, baked ziti, sausage & peppers, garden salad, rolls, meat platter,

soda and dessert.

2011 Jaycees members (in good standing) are invited at no cost.

Cost for anyone else wishing to attend is $20.00

Attendees should RSVP for bowling and/or food as we will be charged separately for each. 

RSVP on meetup no later than Monday, February 6th as final meal head count is due that day. 

RSVP's that cancel after that date will be asked to reimburse chapter.
item.name: Bowl-O-Rama
